sponsor.name: Ingenuitas
sponsor.about: Ingenuitas mission is to implement both existing and novel technologies, alleviating the burden of poverty for generations to come.

sponsor.name: ITP
sponsor.about: ITP works with a variety of financial services firms. With a focus on Independent RIAs, ITP goes beyond the network, and beyond the day-to-day support. They deliver value in areas of Cybersecurity Compliance, Industry Education, and Practice Management.

sponsor.name: Apex Tool Group
sponsor.about: Apex Tool Group (ATG) is one of the largest manufacturers of professional hand and power tools in the world, serving the industrial, vehicle service and assembly, aerospace, electronics, construction and serious DIY markets.
